page.caption: Encounter a wild developer, Anthony!
page.greeting2: I'm Anthony Wong, a web developer.
page.uni_description: 2024 The Times Higher Education World University Rankings: 70th
page.shiji_description: Shiji group mainly provide IT solution in Hospitality industry. 4000+ employees around the world.
page.appicidea_description: An IT startup in Hong Kong which mainly provides entrusted development service.
page.resume_description: Specialize in creating dynamic and responsive web applications. Experienced in an array of JavaScript frameworks including React.js, Vue.js, Angular, Next.js. While I excel in full-stack development, my passion lies in crafting seamless and user-centric frontend experiences. JLPT N1 passed
page.profile_description:
Anthony Wong, Web developer, otaku. Originally from Hong Kong and now based in Japan. Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, and PHP, with expertise in frameworks like React.js, Vue.js, and Node.js. 

Influenced by Japanese culture, particularly anime and Niconico Douga during secondary school. Enjoys playing video games, with Darksouls as a favorite series. 

Recommends the anime 'Undead Unluck' this season.
